pr_title: Fixes issue where an error is output from request(0)

timeline.message: Removing entityPath from ConnectionOptions because it can be to multiple paths.
Adding a catch to IllegalStateException when reactor is free'd from another thread.
Fixing debug error when request(0L) is used.
Adding a queue to drain received messages.
